name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Eclectic Sounds and Diverse Voices**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret brings together 52 artists from around the globe, showcasing an eclectic mix of genres and styles. With a strong focus on alternative and indie sounds, the festival features standout acts in electronic (6), post-punk (5), hip-hop (5), and alternative rock (7 across subgenres). The lineup also embraces niche genres like Afro-psychedelic funk, highlife, and minimal synth, promising a unique auditory journey for fans of all tastes. With a solid average rating of 7.2, the lineup has been carefully curated to highlight both acclaimed performers and hidden gems.

Diversity takes center stage at Best Kept Secret 2026, with artists hailing from 16 countries, including the USA (11), the Netherlands (10), and Australia (5), as well as Ghana, South Africa, and Brazil. The lineup also reflects a range of voices and perspectives, with 12 artists identifying as people of color, while gender representation includes male (22), female (9), mixed-gender (9), and non-binary (1) acts. This rich blend of backgrounds and identities ensures a festival experience that celebrates inclusivity and representation.

Beyond its impressive diversity, the festival offers a well-rounded mix of live music and DJ sets, with three DJs adding a dynamic energy to the event. Every artist in the lineup is connected digitally, with Spotify links available for discovery and pre-festival excitement. Best Kept Secret 2026 continues to live up to its name, offering a thoughtfully curated, genre-spanning experience that combines global talent, fresh sounds, and a commitment to showcasing underrepresented voices in music.
